title: Best of The Herd for Feb 26, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 26, 2020
description:
LeBron "flexing" against Zion

Giannis potentially leaving the Bucks for the Warriors

The Lions needing to draft Tua

Colin was right about Zion a year ago and the media criticized him

Baker Mayfield was pudgy in 2019

Guest: Daniel Jeremiah, NFL Network Draft Analyst from the NFL Combine
